summary: This mod adds 2 sets of armor for Skyrim. Of the fox and the wolf for female characters. Recommended for bodies CBBE, but can normal work with UNP.
descriptionHtml:
My first difficult work on the nexus

This mod adds 2 sets of armor for Skyrim. Of the fox and the wolf for female characters. Recommended for bodies CBBE, but can normal work with UNP.

Sets of armor made entirely from scratch, no vanilla revisions. They consist of leather, fox and wolf, steel chains and fabric. Created in any forge.

I tried to make as little as possible polygons, but it is recommended to have at least 4 GB of RAM.

Version 1.03: More stabilish work. textures compression

this video of one of the users "Inferno" of the previous version 1.01, there is that moment where one not enough textures, the new version 1.02 of this texture has been added.

Optional files (installed on top of the main):

Meshes. Armor without pants.

Sorry for my bad English. Enjoy the game.
author: Severus616
